Reviews.Content: stayed resort company banquet beautiful equally nice complaint 10th floor floor banquet needless definetly sound proof evidently setting ours hear moving furniture racket resting option banquet ice tea waiter menu reply pay bring glass told tea stay company tea provided realize included menu price couple resort beautiful recommend 10th floor banquet

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and lovely, a wonderful place to relax.”
Reviews.Author: perfectcatchdating
Reviews.Content: stayed jan 2225 2010 hotel beautiful clean comfortable traveling safe entire time beachfront patiopool wonderful firepits accent view die king comfy clean except complaintthe shower shower excellent water pressure fixtures werent cleanest curtain stain near bottom issue didnt call complain gym nice hotels beach priceless hot tub hot relaxing didnt venture pool hand touch warm azure restaurant delicious simply turkey club taste fabulous look appetizing ate breakfast morning recommend sitting patio anytime dine view amazing definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: dancinbear
Reviews.Content: gem hotel located 3 miles south daytona features beautiful lobby bar fabulous restaurant sampled restaurant appetizers poolside sandwiches service beautifully incredibly delicious kudos kitchen staff chefs meals extraordinary

HotelInfo.Name: Shores Resort and Spa
HotelInfo.Address: 2637 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118 (Formerly Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort)
